summary: PASSENGER OCCUPANT SENSOR, MALFUNCTION, I HAVE NO AIR BAGS ENABLED OR SEATBELT LOCKS DUE TO THIS FAILING IT'S 800 FOR THE WHOLE PART, PLUS LABOR OF 400. I HAVE EXTENDED WARRANT WHICH DON'T COVER THIS ISSUE. STATES SERVICE AIRBAG. WITHOUT THIS PROPERLY FIXED, THE CAR HAS NO SAFETY EQUIPMENT, AS IN AIRBAGS OR YOUR SEATBELTS LOCKING IN CASE OF A ACCIDENT.  *TR
